name: Python 3 with Anaconda
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y < packages.txt; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit; echo 'âœ… Packages installed and Requirements met'
postCreateCommand: wget https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2023.07-1-Linux-x86_64.sh && bash Anaconda3-2023.07-1-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -p /opt/conda && rm Anaconda3-2023.07-1-Linux-x86_64.sh && echo 'export PATH=/opt/conda/bin:$PATH' >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc && conda init bash && conda install -y streamlit && conda create -n myenv python=3.11 -y && conda activate myenv

postAttachCommand.server: conda activate myenv && streamlit run streamlit_app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
